title: Hi, I'm
a Full-Stack Developer.
quickDescription: With 2+ years experienced in creating scalable web applications using Node.js and modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks. Looking for innovation for your project? Let's work together to create unique solutions combining creativity and exceptional user experiences.
name: Kismath ADELEKE

items.description: Completed through a two-year apprenticeship at Bien’ici as a full-stack developer. Degree focused on  software engineering and compilation theory.
Developed strong foundations in software development and systems design.

title: My
Skills & Experiences
description: I hold a Master's degree in Computer Engineering from Sorbonne University, completed through a two-year apprenticeship at Bien’ici as a full-stack developer. There, I developed innovative 3D digital solutions for real estate promotion.

I specialize in front-end development, crafting modern, responsive websites using JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue.js, React, and HTML/CSS, while also having experience in back-end development with Node.js and Python.
Proficient in database management and cloud computing, I am a quick learner who thrives on challenges and is committed to delivering clean, maintainable code and exceptional user experiences.

allaboutMe.title: A liltle about Me
allaboutMe.intro: I’m a Software Engineer located in France. I  am passionate about  UI effects and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences.
details: I thrive on challenges, tackling them with creativity and precision to deliver optimal solutions.
I’m eager to work across the creative frontend spectrum, collaborating on ambitious projects with like-minded, positive people.
Beyond coding, I’m deeply passionate about fitness and boxing, exploring the outdoors with friends, binge-watching top TV series, and immersing myself in English literature.
